content: this is an intermediate pattern basic knowledge of standard crochet stitches is needed for this pattern this listing is for the purchase of a crochet pattern to make my lion brand sesame street one hat wonder toddler hat this hat fits a 14 - 16 circumference materials need for this pattern are 1 ball of lion brand one hat wonder yarn 1 oz 63 yds coordinating color of red heart super saver yarn or equivalent h 5 0 mm crochet hook i 5 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors and 1 stitch marker optional happy crocheting dawn ninja bunny crochet join us on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/256729119406974
